replies.bodyText: createForUpdate creates an empty object with just the id https://github.com/apache/cloudstack/blob/master/framework/db/src/main/java/com/cloud/utils/db/GenericDaoBase.java#L295 , whereas a template object read from the db needed to check whether it's cross zone
replies.author: davidjumani

replies.bodyText: Line 2075 already has that, we need to check why createForUpdate was used in the first place.
replies.author: rhtyd

replies.bodyText: Required since it's changed from createForUpdate to findById
replies.author: davidjumani

replies.bodyText: Persist is usually used for a new record, I'm concerned if this causes any regression or duplicates in DB.
replies.author: rhtyd

replies.bodyText: There are several instances where findById has been used prior to persist. Tested and no duplicate DB entries were created. Also persist internally uses update : https://github.com/apache/cloudstack/blob/master/framework/db/src/main/java/com/cloud/utils/db/GenericDaoBase.java#L1389
replies.author: davidjumani

replies.bodyText: I was considering getting this towards 4.15RC2 but the additional changes don't give us confidence - only the conditional check was enough to handle the issue.
replies.author: rhtyd

replies.bodyText: Makes sense, moving the check up
